item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 14 Feb 2023
item.description:
1. Could merlin be compiled with js_of_ocaml and work in the browser
  2. Opine 0.1.0 - Python source code transformations in OCaml
  3. Paul Biggar on Darklang
  4. Seppo.Social v0.1 and Request for Comments
  5. List your open OCaml positions on the OCaml.org job board
  6. Available for Hire - Q1 2023
  7. Timedesc 1.0.0 - modern date time handling
  8. Major updates to kcas in 0.1.8 and 0.2.0

item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 07 Feb 2023
item.description:
1. Tezt 3.0.0, now JS-compatible and in its own repository
  2. Shuttle 0.9.1 released
  3. Outreachy Summer 2023
  4. Usability improvements in the OCaml compiler codebase
  5. Learning to write PPX extenders: some links
  6. Stramon 0.3.0 - Process behavior monitoring utility based on strace

item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 31 Jan 2023
item.description:
1. Stramon 0.2.2 - Process behavior monitoring utility based on strace

item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 24 Jan 2023
item.description:
1. The Growth of the OCaml (Binary) Distribution
  2. Ocaml 5.0.0 in Pyre - mostly smooth sailing, Gc.stat regression

  6. OCaml Software Foundation: January 2023 update
  7. An Emacs mode for Cram tests
  8. Taking a look: some open OCaml Pull Requests
  9. odep initial release

item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 17 Jan 2023
item.description:

item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 20 Dec 2022
item.description:
1. B·o·B, an universal and secure peer-to-peer file-transfer in OCaml

item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 13 Dec 2022
item.description:
